reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, coming just to their knees, and appreciate its pretty pattern and soft material. The dress is true to size with sleeves that aren't too long or short, and customers describe it as comfortable with pockets. They like the colors and fabric quality, with one customer noting the cotton-like hand of the material. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and Comfortable
items.body: What a lovely dress for fall! I paired this with tall boots for a quick and pretty outfit choice. Easy care fabric is soft on the skin. And the length is just right at just above the knee. Looking at other colors! Read more
items.author: wordplay2011

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: Cute dress with nice material. I like the pockets which are hidden. Great for casual wear or special occasions depending on accessories. Fit was perfect. Nice length. Read more
items.author: Corriekae

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and pretty.
items.body: The dress fit well. It is size large. It is comfortable and soft. I love the fall colors. The only problem with the dress is that the back hem kept pulling up making the hem all around uneven. I would buy again even so. Read more
items.author: Melanie D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit me perfectly. Love it!
items.body: This fit perfectly, I needed something quickly to wear to my father’s memorial service. I paired it with a pair of knee-high boots and some gold jewelry and it was very comfortable. I’m usually not a pocket type person on my dresses, but this has pockets and they didn’t seem to bother me. I had many compliments. It was not clingy, even though it was polyester. Fabric weight was great was not see-through. Read more
items.author: K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Budget friendly
items.body: I really love this dress! The colors are perfect for fall and winter, and will be stylish with tall boots. I love that the cuffs have enough stretch that I can push up the sleeves, if needed. The fit is perfect and true size. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Terri K

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars True to size but such a strong detergent smell
items.body: It fits good. True to size. I just don’t like that it has a very strong detergent smell. Seems like someone else had it and washed it. Read more
items.author: Isabel Farmer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: Beautiful dress! I ordered a size up from what I normally wear since the fabric does not stretch. It's perfect for me. Because I'm only 5'2", the hemline is below the knee. Read more
items.author: AmazonCustomer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice fall dress
items.body: This dress is very comfortable and I received a number of compliments. My only reason for less than 5 star is the length is shorter than stated in the size chart. I like it just below my knees and the medium is just above my knees. I am 5'2" and 157 lbs (curvy). It fits well otherwise. I wore it with tall brown boots and a beige leatherjacket. Very nice fall dress. Read more
items.author: Doreen M.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue Green Floral, Navy Floral, Black Floral, A-black, Blue, Burgundy, White Floral, Mixed Printed, Light Khaki Floral, Chic Printed, Navy, Brown Floral, Xmas Green, Black Floral 02. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
